# 11b5L
#  the book of Isaiah
# zavTu transliteration
# by john.david jones
# ozazL
#
#  abcde
#  fghij
#  kLmno
#  pqrsT
#  tuvxz
#--
#  a as in father
#  b as in baby
#  c as in chess
#  d as in day
#  e as in help
#  f as in father
#  g as in good
#  h as in hello 
#  i as in me
#  j as in jupiter
#  k as in katherine
#  L as in lamb
#  m as in make
#  n as in now
#  o as in open 
#  p as in padre
#  q as in quickly
#  r as in rope
#  s as in simple
#  T like Today
#  t as in thanks
#  u as in Tube
#  v as in very
#  x as is nexT
#  z as in zebra
#--
#  one syllable per vowel
#  ubzeiu -> ub-ze-i-u  
#-----------------------ch 1
